programme.title: Fitness Influencer vs Olympians featuring Susana Yabar
programme.desc: Fitness social influencer Susana Yabar is paired with Olympic medallist Natasha Hastings, Ukrainian triathlete Yuliya Yelisatratova and table tennis star Hugo Caldenaro to see if she can hang with their intense workouts.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 12 - Evening Session - Athletics | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/08/2021 at the Olympic Stadium, Tokyo. It includes the Men's 200m and 800m Final, the Women's 200m Final Victory Ceremony, the Women's 3000m Steeplechase Final and Victory Ceremony, the Men's Hammer Throw Final, the Women's 400m and 1500m Semifinals as well as Women's Heptathlon (Shot Put, 200m) and Men's Decathlon (High Jump, 400m).

programme.title: Men's Hammer Throw Final - Athletics | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/08/2021 at the Olympic Stadium, Tokyo. Nowicki (POL) claimed the Gold, Henriksen (NOR) Silver and Fajdek (POL) completed the podium

programme.title: Anatomy of a Skateboarder: How Does Tom Schaar Get Big Air?
programme.desc: We took US skateboarder Tom Schaar to a sports science lab to uncover the physical secrets of the first skateboarder to land a 1080. With the help of Olympian Lolo Jones, each episode of our sports science original series Anatomy of studies the powers and physiques of an elite athlete to find out what makes them special in their sport.

programme.title: Women's Long Jump Final - Athletics | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 03/08/2021 at the Olympic Stadium, Tokyo. Mihambo (GER) claimed the Gold, Reese (USA) Silver and Brume (NGR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's Long Jump Final - Athletics | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2021 at the Olympic Stadium, Tokyo. Miltiadis Tentoglou (GRE) claimed the Gold, Juan Miguel Echevarria (CUB) the Silver and Maykel Masso (CUB) completed the podium.

programme.title: CAN v USA & ESP v CHN - Women's Quarter-Finals - Water Polo | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: These Women's Quarterfinal Matches were played on 03/08/2021 at the Tatsumi Water Polo Centre, Tastumi.

programme.title: FRA v BRN - Men's Quarter-Final - Handball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This Men's Quarterfinal Match took place on 03/08/2021 at the Yoyogi National Stadium, Tokyo. Final Score FRA 42:28 BRN

programme.title: GER v USA & BRA v SUI - Women's Quarter-Finals - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event tookplace on 03/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. It includes the Women's Quarterfinal Matches Ludwig/Kozuch (GER) v April/Alix (USA) and Ana Patricia/Rebecca (BRA) v Verge-Depre/Heidrich (SUI)

programme.title: The graceful journey of Olympic champion, Jessica von Bredow-Werndl | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Jessica’s dream became reality at Tokyo 2020 with two Olympic Gold medals in dressage in the individual and team event. But her incredible bond with her horse, Dalera, is forged by hard work and an implacable discipline at Aubenhausen world-class riding centre. With her title back on the line at Paris 2024, she opens the doors of her family estate and reflects, with her family and her team, on an emotional journey full of joy and determination.

programme.title: French kiteboarding prodigee on her way to gold at Paris | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Lauriane Nolot, the current world champion, aims for Gold at Paris 2024 on the shores of Marseille where Formula Kite will make its Olympic debut. Hailing from Camps-la-Source, an hour away from the Olympic venue, she climbs the ranks with determination from family get-aways to world podium. Her impressive journey propels her to the pinnacle of her sport, ready to shine on the Olympic stage.

programme.title: France's Sevens captain targets gold at Paris 2024 | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Backed by a great team and high perfornming coaches, Carla's quest for Olympic gold symbolizes the rise of women's rugby since Rio 2016. From competing with boys to leading her nation to Silver in Tokyo 2020, the French rugby Seven squad’s captain inspires resilience and dedication on the road to Paris 2024.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 11 - Canoe Sprint | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 03/08/2021 at the Sea Forrest waterway, Tokyo. It includes the Women's Kayak Single 200m, the Women's Kayak Double 500m , the Men's Kayak Single 1000m and Men's Canoe Double 1000m Finals as well as their Victory Ceremonies.

programme.title: Ezra: A high-jumper finds community and another chance | The Starting Line
programme.desc: As high-jump reigning World Champion, Ezra Frech prepares to return to the Paralympics for the second time. He reflects on his remarkable journey with his father and together with his mother, he takes us to meet their wider and beloved Californian community as they organize a unique event for adaptative sports in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Ferdinand: The Beast from the East returns to his roots | The Starting Line
programme.desc: Known as the ‘Fastest Man in Africa’ for his prowess in the 100m, Ferdinand Omanyala is setting his sights on becoming the fastest man in the world at Paris 2024. We follow him as he travels back to his hometown of Kitale in Kenya to get the blessings he needs from his peers and uncover the remarkable story of his origins.

programme.title: Nikoloz: The judo World Champion from two nations | The Starting Line
programme.desc: When Nikoloz Sherazadishvili’s family moved him from Georgia to Spain at a young age, his father instilled a love of judo in him. He quickly felt at home at the local club of Brunete, in the outskirt of Madrid, where everything started with his first coach Quino Ruiz. As he gears up for his second Olympics, surrounded by his family and friends, he’s competing on the mat for Spain but also holding Georgia and the memory of his father close to his heart.

programme.title: Carlota: Proving herself and her sport to the world | The Starting Line
programme.desc: A young female breaker for France, Carlota Dudek is training to qualify for the Olympics to showcase her unique style to the world, inherited from her mother Cuban origin. We travel with her from Paris to her hometown in the heart of Provence where her life-long dance journey began.

programme.title: Manon: How the bond with her horse changed her life | The Starting Line
programme.desc: Two-time medallist in dressage at Tokyo 2020, Manon Claeys shares her inspiring journey back from severe injury to Paralympic podium. After her accident, she thought she would never ride a horse again. Now, together with her cherished horse Katarina, and surrounded by her team and family, she trains to achieve a gold medal at Paris 2024.

programme.title: Duets Technical Routine - Artistic Swimming | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 03/08/2021 at the Tokyo Aquatics Centre, Tokyo. Kolesnichenko/ Romashina (ROC) lead the field into the Free Routine.

programme.title: The graceful journey of Olympic champion, Jessica von Bredow-Werndl | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Jessica’s dream became reality at Tokyo 2020 with two Olympic Gold medals in dressage in the individual and team event. But her incredible bond with her horse, Dalera, is forged by hard work and an implacable discipline at Aubenhausen world-class riding centre. With her title back on the line at Paris 2024, she opens the doors of her family estate and reflects, with her family and her team, on an emotional journey full of joy and determination.

Her impressive journey propels her to the pinnacle of her sport, ready to shine on the Olympic stage.

From competing with boys to leading her nation to Silver in Tokyo 2020, the French rugby Seven squad’s captain inspires resilience and dedication on the road to Paris 2024.

programme.title: CAN v ROC - Men's Quarter-Final - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Men's Quarterfinal Match between Canada and ROC took place on 03/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Final Score ROC 3:0 CAN

programme.title: CAN v USA & ESP v CHN - Women's Quarter-Finals - Water Polo | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: These Women's Quarterfinal Matches were played on 03/08/2021 at the Tatsumi Water Polo Centre, Tastumi.

programme.title: Teahupo'o Surf Camp | Road to Paris 2024
programme.desc: Experience the thrills and spills as seven surfers join an ISA surf camp at Teahupo'o, Tahiti's famed surf spot and the surfing venue for the Olympic Games Paris 2024. Determined to conquer the Olympic wave, they face their fears, push the boundaries and challenge the raw power of nature.

programme.title: From The Top Episode 2: Charlotte Worthington and The Vamps
programme.desc: Olympic BMX champion Charlotte Worthington meets one of her favourite bands, The Vamps. After attending their concert and hanging our backstage, she invites them for some action at the BMX park. Will they be up for the challenge?

programme.title: Novak Djokovic at age 21
programme.desc: A day in the life of a 21-year-old Novak Djokovic when he was living and training in Monte Carlo.

programme.title: GER v USA & BRA v SUI - Women's Quarter-Finals - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event tookplace on 03/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. It includes the Women's Quarterfinal Matches Ludwig/Kozuch (GER) v April/Alix (USA) and Ana Patricia/Rebecca (BRA) v Verge-Depre/Heidrich (SUI)

programme.title: SUI v USA & AUS v LAT - Semi-Finals - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 05/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. It includes the Women;s Semifinals Verge-Depre/Heidrich (SUI) v April/Alix (USA) and Artacho Del Solar/Clancy (AUS) v Graudina/Kravcenoka (LAT)

programme.title: Deva Handball Club
programme.desc: Team Sweden Olympic hero Thomas Sivertsson travels to Great Britain to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling handball team.

programme.title: Women's Bronze & Gold Medal Matches - Beach Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 06/08/2021 at the Shiokaze Park, Tokyo. April/Alix (USA) claimed Gold beating Artacho Del Solar/Clancy (AUS) 2:0 and Verge-Depre/Heidrich (SUI) the Bronze beating Graudina/Kravcenoka (LAT)

programme.title: JPN v BRA - Men's Quarter-Final - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Men's Quarterfinal Match between Japan and Brazil took place on 03/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Final Score BRA 3:0 JPN

programme.title: SRB v ITA - Women's Quarter-Final - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Women's Quarterfinal Match between Serbia and Italy took place on 04/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Final Score SRB 3:0 ITA

programme.title: Eileen Nasuh & Judd Henkes fight for their dreams
programme.desc: Eileen Nasuh, a 12 year old Volleyball Player from Kenya and Judd Henkes, a 15 year old Snowboarder from the USA, fight for their dreams.

programme.title: FRA v ARG - Men's Semi-Final - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Men's Semifinal Match between FRA and ARG took place on 05/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Final Score FRA 3:0 ARG

programme.title: BRA v KOR - Women's Semi-Final - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Women's Semifinal Match between TBC took place on 06/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Final Score BRA 3:0 KOR

programme.title: KOR v SRB - Women's Bronze Medal Match - Volleyball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match took place on 08/08/2021 at the Ariake Arena, Tokyo. Serbia claimed Bronze with a 3:0 victory over South Korea

programme.title: FRA v EGY - Men's Semi-Final - Handball | Tokyo 2020 Replays
programme.desc: This Men's Semifinal Match took place on 05/08/21 at the Yoyogi National Stadium, Tokyo. Final Score FRA 27: 23 EGY
